justification: “Participants completed a digit-sorting task as a measure of working memory… A maximum of fifteen points could be scored on the task.”

“A Stroop task was used as a measure of inhibition… We computed two scores: the difference between reaction times in neutral and congruent trials (semantic facilitation), and… neutral and incongruent trials (semantic interference).”

measured_by: false-alarm rates in LateGo and NoGo trials
justification: “To characterize response inhibition, we analysed false alarm rates in LateGo and NoGo trials during the main task.”

measured_by: Spontaneous Strategy Switch Task (proportion of color-based responses / CUSUM switch point)
justification: “Experiment 1 tested children and young adults with the Spontaneous Strategy Switch Task, which assesses the ability to discover and implement a novel strategy… we first assessed to what extent responses in ambiguous trials were based on stimulus color.”
